nodes.text: The Asexual Professional Greenputt Tour, abbreviated APGT, was one of the major professional greenputt leagues in 22 BBY. It was overseen by the Greenputt Governing Council.
The Asexual Professional Greenputt Tour was first mentioned in the in-universe news story "Yet Another Greenputt League," which was published on the HoloNet News website in 2002.
